reviewText: This was for my brother for Christmas as transplants from the UK we are all missing our football (soccer) and he is a big Wolves fan so this was the perfect gift for him, I was a little disappointed when they said it would not be delivered for about 2 to 3 weeks meaning that it would not be here till the middle of January but I resigned myself to telling him it was on its way. To my surprise it was delivered to him (I had them send it to his house) on Christmas eve 2 weeks before the estimated delivery time. The DVD was everything I thought it would be, it was in great condition and my brother now can have his wolves fix whenever he wants!!
